widget.name: Notifications
widget.description: Trigger actions based on incoming notifications.

property.caption: Action name
property.description: Unique identifier for the action (Should match the notification action name provided in the 'Send message' action).

property.caption: On receive
property.description: Called when the notification is received while the application is running. Only applicable to remote notifications.

property.caption: On open
property.description: Called when the application is opened by tapping the notification. By default the application opens without further action.

property.caption: GUID
property.description: If a handled notification includes an object, the GUID of that object will be set on this attribute.

property.caption: Title
property.description: If the notification has a title, this attribute will get that value.

property.caption: Subtitle
property.description: If the notification has a subtitle, this attribute will get that value.

property.caption: Body
property.description: If the notification has a body, this attribute will get that value.

property.caption: Actions
property.description: If the notification has actions, this attribute will get the name of all actions joined by spaces.
